title: This ready-for-anything 140W four-port Anker charger is cheaper than ever today
description: Macworld In these busy times, no one has precious minutes to wait to charge one device at a time. Thankfully, you won’t have such an issue with this four-port Anker charger and you can get one now for just $70 with the $30 coupon on the page. That’s the lowest price we’ve ever seen This powerful multiport GaN charger delivers a maximum output of 140W, ensuring your laptop, phone, and other gadgets stay charged.The top two USB-C ports can each deliver up to 140W, while the third USB-C port provides 40W, and there’s also a single 33W USB-A port. Keep in mind that when charging multiple devices simultaneously, the 140W output will be distributed among the active ports. Oh, and you won’t even have to worry about cables too much, because the charger already comes with a 5-foot 240W Type-C cable. So snag this powerful Anker charger for $70 before this deal expires.
